trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown" /> event and the <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados de evento do evento <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown" /> e do evento <see cref="E:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded" />.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.AppDomain> instância for desligada ou descarregada, um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> evento ou um <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> é gerado, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> objeto armazena o motivo para o desligamento ou unload e é passado para o manipulador de eventos como um de seus parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: O motivo do desligamento do domínio de aplicativo hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> com o <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> propriedade definida como `reason`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o motivo do desligamento do domínio de aplicativo hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> repositórios de propriedades uma <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> objeto como seu valor que descreve por que o <xref:System.AppDomain> instância foi desligada.
